description:
Hold'em and Fold'em with "High Stakes Texas Hold'em", a world famous poker game now available as DSiWare!

Enjoy Single Player mode, or addictive Multiplayer mode with up to 4 players.

Play with "no limit" rules at the World Championship with over $16 million in prize money!

An "information analysis feature" allows you to calculate all sorts of information, and another feature allows you to view hand explanations at any time!

Get your poker fix at any time with "High Stakes Texas Hold'em!
name: High Stakes Texas Hold'em
